snippet: The banking world in 2012 New York City offers itself as almost a Medellín cartel of shady dealings.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column holds that recently released Senate report on money laundering faults HSBC on such a grand scale that it makes New York City's financial industry look almost like a Medellin cartel of shady and unscrupulous dealings.
lead_paragraph: The banking world in 2012 New York City offers itself as almost a Medellín cartel of shady dealings.

headline.seo: In the Financial World, a Less Scrupulous Class of Lawbreaker
headline.main: In the Financial Industry, a Less Scrupulous Class of Lawbreaker
headline.print_headline: In the Financial Industry, a Less Scrupulous Class of Lawbreaker
